title: Chicken Tarragon
directions: Season meat with salt and pepper and coat a skillet with olive oil.
Brown chicken [about 3 minutes on each side]
and remove to a plate and cover.
Add remaining olive oil and cook shallots till transparent and slightly golden [about 2-3 minutes]
It is time to add the wine and chicken broth and a little bit of cumin and chili powder seasoning.
Let it simmer like this for several minutes and return chicken to simmer in mixture. Remember to flip chicken so that it becomes thoroughly cooked. [about 5-6 minutes]
Remove chicken again onto plate and now add tarragon, scallions, more seasonings, Dijon mustard, and sour cream to sauce.
Use a wooden spoon to stir and flip sauce if possible. Make sure heat is reduced to simmer standards.
Return the chicken to the mixture and continue to simmer in the sauce. Coat sauce evenly on both sides. [roughly 5 more minutes or until chicken is cooked thoroughly inside and out]
Serve with sauce on top of chicken or on the side as a dip [optional]
